name: Graph Exchange Language File
summary: Learn about .GXL files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: The GXL format was originally published in 2000. It is now less popularly used than other graph formats such as .GRAPHML, .GML, and .XGMML.

description: Graph data file created in the GXL (Graph Exchange Language) format, a format used for transferring graphs between software applications; stores the nodes and edges and properties that make up the graph; uses an XML format that allows interoperability between programs.
